attributes.action: remove any MP who represents a scottish constituency from any ministerial position in the UK Government and bar any future appointment of any scottish constituency MP to any ministerial position in any future Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of government ministerial positions are currently occupied by representatives of scottish constituencies, none of whom have any form of mandate from the people who are most affected by their activities in Government.  These people cannot have the best interests of the english voter at heart because they do not represent them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
